title: Little Red Gem
description: "It really impressed me that the author combined all of her talents — writing, songwriting and singing — to bring this poignant YA paranormal to life." Robin Covington USA Today A bitter sweet, foolhardy mission it is to want to know how much the boy you love loves you back. Ruby Parker, a sixteen year old singer in an all girl band, one day finds herself on such a mission and then there’s no going back, no matter how crazy that mission makes you.With the aid of bad advice from a ghost who is trapped by a curse, a little bit of magic courtesy of her unsuspecting half-sister, and a televised music talent show coming to town to hold auditions, Ruby Parker makes more of a mess in death than she ever did in life. Bad choices, right choices, she’ll do whatever it takes to find out how much Leo loved her. Because her life truly does depend on the answer.Can she fix everything before it’s too late? Or will she spend eternity as a ghost, haunted by the unknown depths of love?Either way, one thing Ruby learns is that while love can make you do crazy things, it can make you do amazing things too. But at what cost?
author: D.L. Richardson
